website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, they are the best value by EMU if you want a pair of versatile, warm boots that are available in a variety of colors for both boys and girls.
pros: Practical boots that are warm enough for toddlers and kids thanks to sheepskin craftsmanship
The design and colors complement many kids' styles
cons: Occasional durability issues have been reported, including separating soles and shedding lining

customer_reviews.title: Happy Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received these simple boots for my daughter and I’m happy I took a chance. Emu brand could be pricey. But, I purchased them for under $20.00. They will be perfect for the fall and winter months. The quality is good and I pulled at the shearling to make sure it did not come apart easily. The sole is pretty thick but not heavy. Happy with my purchase and hope that you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: Five year old daughter LOVED this boot
customer_reviews.text: Five year old daughter LOVED this boot. She was a 1.5 (wide and thick footed) and a size 2 fitted nicely. The hot pink was a hit and the wool stayed fairly fluffy after daily winter rough wears. It repelled sand, dirt and water fairly well and doesn't stained too much. Knocked down a star because after awhile, the interior sole, the wool started to bunched and she complained it annoyed her.
customer_reviews.author: Azulza

customer_reviews.title: They're not Uggs, but they're close!
customer_reviews.text: First ones I ordered the stitching came loose and the toe started separating from the sole, but Amazon was lightning fast and hassle free about switching them out for me! I even received the replacement pair before I shipped the damaged pair. My 5 year old also has a pair of these in purple. They are very durable boots. I don't find them as attractive as the more expensive uggs, but for the colors & the price, they will certainly do just fine!
customer_reviews.author: C.B.

customer_reviews.title: They were cute but I'm bitterly disappointed and surprised on how poorly they held up
customer_reviews.text: Bought Emu's before and this is the first time ever that they fell apart so rapidly. They were cute but I'm bitterly disappointed and surprised on how poorly they held up. I have Emu's that are 3 years old and look just as good as the day I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 6 in women's and the last adult Emus I had became too large after awhile and my feet slid around in the boot. These were a little tight the first day or so but now they're perfect. My feet are always warm and these boot actually have traction unlike some other similar brands. I have had no problems with the fluff coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Hayfab

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed - have never left negative review but felt compelled ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer BEWARE these are not real Emu - fur lining is shedding and pulling out every single day - also Emu patch on back of boot and stamp on bottom of boot do not match other authentic pair. Extremely disappointed - have never left negative review but felt compelled to share
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tripodi

customer_reviews.title: Grand daughters birthday boots
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had ordered the light pink boots for my grand daughters 8th birthday only to find out they were pink with numerous stamped hearts on the outside. Even thought they weren't the boots I thought I ordered my grand daughter was thrilled with the present. They fit perfectly and she was already planning an outfit to wear for the school next day to show off her new boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: love them love them love them. received 3 compliments on my boots just yesterday. Warm,comfy,cute, and fun. The color is vibrant like shown in the picture. i just love them. Bought a 4kids and I wear a 6 women. They fit snuggly but stretch with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mcarr030

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these Emu for the last 3 years for my daughter and my niece, they love them! They are soft, comfy and warm once they grow out if them I pass them on. I would recommend Emu to everyone the price is grate and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: C.Ru.

customer_reviews.title: soft and good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and as you would expect the best shoe for running around and keeping little feet warm. I would purchase them again. Sizing seems right too but like uggs I know they will stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 2 wears
customer_reviews.text: These things are terrible!!! After 1 week of wear, they are falling apart. The seams are ripping and all of the wool is falling out in clumps. I am so disappointed, but at this point can not get my money back. Buy some Uggs and call it a day, these boots are not worth $10. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Margret Nicole Tuzzolino

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot and Color
customer_reviews.text: These boots are wonderful - great purple color and very warm. My 7-year old daughter loves them and the purple color goes with so many things. I would strongly recommend these boots. They're also true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Poochie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box on Christmas day, one of the vertical seams started to unravel. The thread came completely off and the seam opened up. We had to return these boots and there were no more purple available for an exact exchange. My daughter was in tears as she had her heart set on the purple. We are exchanging for another color, much to her disappointment. I'm hoping that this was a fluke and the next pair is better made. Will post again if there is another problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Hue

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought the wrong size, bought a size 1, should have bought size 13, but my daughter will grow into them :) Cool color and nice quality boots. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Toasty boots for little toes.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful. The fit was perfect. They are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool for a boy !
customer_reviews.text: While all our daughters enjoy this great styled shoe,finding one for a boy to kick around in at home was tricky as the styling/colors are increasingly more feminine not-to-mention some out there are soooo expensive ! These arrived and were immediately plopped on and oooed and ahhhed about- he has worn them out and he wears them all day when he is home and they stay by his bed to be put on first thing in the morning;great for even a quick run outside to take out the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old grandson. They are wonderful. He loves them as well. They should last him two winters (size wise). I highly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ccoast

customer_reviews.title: Great boot, runs small
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love EMU boots. They wear extremely well and my daughters say they are really comfortable. Size up- we had to return to get a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality boots with plush shearling lining. Originally looked at Uggs but these were half the price and in my opinion are better quality. The shearling is excellent quality and I think the children find them comfortable as they don't want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: My children's personal shopper

customer_reviews.title: cozy easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: perfect boot for my 3 year old. she gets them on and off with ease and chooses them everytime we leave the house they hold up great and are so warm for her feet in this new england frigidity
customer_reviews.author: Amy Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Super winter boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Bought boots as present for friends daughter and will definatelly buy EMU boots for my family :)
customer_reviews.author: Sofya Alimbekova

customer_reviews.title: Cutest purple boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Fit perfect. Great color. Ver comfortable. Very we'll made@ a great price. We love emu products! Never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Andrus

customer_reviews.title: soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: My daugter loves these! She wore out her pair from last year so, we ordered another. She was excited about the pink color too!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved them! They were beautifully crafted and exactly as advertised by the company. I was extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jo Scalley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable boots and the high quality that I expected from EMU. Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Dlaine

customer_reviews.title: exactly what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked these and they did not disappoint. They look great with almost anything and keep my daughter's feet warm while being relatively cheap.
customer_reviews.author: masha

customer_reviews.title: Less than Uggs but just as nice!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to pay Ugg prices for a pair of little girl boots. Found these Emu's and they are just as nice or nicer! I think the support in them is better also. I purchased a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: mslap

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: It fits a little large for the size it should be. They are very warm and comfortable. Color transfers but inside feels soft.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: The quality of theses boots is just a nice as their more expensive counterpart. They seem like they will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Meyers

customer_reviews.title: great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with shipping, but amazon handled it perfectly. The boot fits my daughter great. Would recommend these boots. Same quality as her uggs and half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: These are the cutest boots! They are soft and well made. These are a must have for any little girl.
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and soft. Just like Uggs but less costly
customer_reviews.author: Frugal

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order. Disappointing. The descriptions for this product are UNTRUE, be aware: These are MADE IN CHINA, NOT OF SHEEPSKIN, but of suade and Marino wool. Just not Uggs. You get what you paid for. I hope Amazon can correct the descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Huiyuan Pan

customer_reviews.title: EMUs are a win!
customer_reviews.text: I bought EMUs for my daughter who has been desperate for UGGs. I frankly was unwilling to buy UGGs for two reasons. I am not a brand chaser and I was not enamored with the price, especially for a 10-year old whose feet are still growing. The EMU is comfortable and functional. I cannot comment on durability given that we have had them for only two months. She has, however, worn them almost every day for the last two months-she would sleep in them if I let her- and the boots still look brand new. I am very happy with the quality and price of the boot. My daughter is thrilled with the style. I would absolutely buy, again.
customer_reviews.author: acqua alta

customer_reviews.title: ... just a bit tricky to get on but I love them and will happily buy larger sizes when my ...
customer_reviews.text: They are just a bit tricky to get on but I love them and will happily buy larger sizes when my son grows out of them :)
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: comfy & pretty
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves these boots & wears them all the time. Beautiful color, great quality & half the price of that other brand!
customer_reviews.author: J. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: I reseived boots that looked different than those on pictures. Besides all the mistakes they are still cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit into
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great but my daughter does not like it on her feet. It was hard to fit into and seems tight on the ankle area.
customer_reviews.author: L. P.

customer_reviews.title: Good causal boots
customer_reviews.text: It's not soft like Uggs but for the price it's definitely worth the purchase. Keeps me warm when I walk the dogs. I'm a size 5-5.5 in women's but 3 in kids.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda H Le

customer_reviews.title: Better than UGGS
customer_reviews.text: A couple of years ago I went looking for another pair of UGGS and discovered they were now made in China. I don't have anything against China, but I'd prefer my Aussie boots made in Australia. Doing a little more research I discovered EMU. Wow! What a difference. I don't have anything against UGGS but EMU boots are far superior. The soles are stronger and the sheepskin is much nicer. Now we all wear EMU. Better than UGGS. Love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Baby Mommy

customer_reviews.title: So far so great!  Just arrived and they are so darn cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves them!! The color (mushroom) is perfect, matches everything. Easy to put on and wear. Not sure how they will last but for now I am completely satisfied. I am thinking the other brand has nothing on these, except more $$$. My best friend had to purchase a pair for her son!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Very warm and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (and wife) love it for winter time weather. Uggs for kids at a great price. Lifesaver for cold weather
customer_reviews.author: H. Chin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as my Granddaughter opened these on Christmas, she put them on. They are really nice boots. They are JUST as nice as the more expensive ones, that kids will outgrow fast anyway. She said they were really comfortale & warm, and that's all that counts. The shipping was VERY fast.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots, good quality, true to size
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boots - my 7 year old daughter loves them and wears them frequently. They are good quality and less expensive than the Ugg brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots are made well. My daughters love how soft and warm they feel. I would definitely recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ed.

customer_reviews.title: Our Daughters Love these Boots...
customer_reviews.text: We brought these pink EMU's on sale at a great discount after Christmas. I am sorry now that I did not buy a few pairs. Our daughter(7)will not take these boots off even in the house. Our older daughter(15)loves her pair in a chocolate brown. I read the reviews later on and they are supposed to be made better than UGG's.
customer_reviews.author: Tlmmoore1

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my daughter. I didn't want to spend $120 for the "other" brand, but I wanted a nice pair of boots for my 3 year old. These are just as cute and very nicely made. Glad I chose this brand and we love the boots!
customer_reviews.author: erinmuss

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has only had these boots for a few weeks but raves about how comfortable they are. She's owned EMU's in the past and loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy, Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear an adult size 6 but didn't want to pay well over $100 for these boots. I ordered the child size 4 and they fit perfect and are super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M. Swain

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves Her EMUs!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th pair of EMUs my daughter has had. She prefers them to UGGs as "Everyone wears UGGS." They were delivered on time and 100% accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We've seen them elsewhere for $70-100 more. My wife wanted to buy on one of those shoe discount sites and when I told her to check Amazon first she laughed. We saved $104 with the shipping, which was free on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: BriMed

customer_reviews.title: Made my daughter happy
customer_reviews.text: These have held up well to frequent wear and were a great value compared to the much coveted top brand.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot for the price. Highly recommend. My daughter loves them. I always buy this brand of boots, so much cheaper than Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: Karla McWhorter

customer_reviews.title: These boot are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my granddaughter for Christmas. She loves them, they fit great. After reading reviews on similarboots I bought a size larger than she wears in shoes. They fit great. I am very satisfied with them.

customer_reviews.title: Boots review
customer_reviews.text: Where what my 3 year old granddaughter was looking for. Size and color were perfect. they look great on her
customer_reviews.author: Donald Orsini

customer_reviews.title: Winter Boots
customer_reviews.text: These boots wear well and keep small feet warm in the very cold weather in Wisconsin. I will buy these again next winter,
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Blitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable on my 3 year old Granddaughter, they are well made, and look adorable on her. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Dublin

customer_reviews.title: Too wide!
customer_reviews.text: It's too wide. So go for one size smaller! Other than that it is ok. My son has to wear this next winter!TT
customer_reviews.author: Jinsun chung

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. Looks good. My 7 yr old daughter loves!
customer_reviews.author: Lee, Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love them very well made. These are my 2 nd pair of emu's and I prefer them to the other brand
customer_reviews.author: Allison Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this boots for my 3 years old girl ans the look is really good!! The fit is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I love these EMU Wallabies
customer_reviews.text: My toes are to the very end. If you think I'm saying this as a bad thing, I'm not. they're a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie McBride

customer_reviews.title: little girl boots
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift, from what I heard from her mom she loves them and still uses them
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Gheorghiu

customer_reviews.title: Do not last
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots for my son. He loves them as they are warm and fuzzy, but only a month or two later they start to look very worn. All the threading around the outter edging is frayed and hanging. We sprayed them all the time but they've faded and the color no longer looks nice. We still like them but I will definitely order Uggs next time
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: returned as grandson didn't like them -- they were fine but he is picky
customer_reviews.author: Rsus

customer_reviews.title: Love them...
customer_reviews.text: The boots arrived. Fits my daughter perfect. She loves how pretty they are. I love knowing her feet are warm and comfortable when she is wearing them. I ordered 2 sizes after reading some of the reviews but she was true to her size. They shipped promptly and the return process for the other boot was so easy. Amazon made this shoe buying experience awesome.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: boots
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like these boots. I did not receive the chocolate ones I was dissatisfied. Fur wears quickly from reviews
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my small, adult feet warm
customer_reviews.text: I'm unfortunately a size 5 women's and that does not help me much when browsing the shoe department. However, these size 3 Emus fit my feet perfectly. They still are in good condition even after several months of use. They keep my feet warm and look great with leggings or jeans. Overall, I'd recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Icegirl

product_meta.title: EMU Australia Wallaby Classic Lo Boot (Toddler/Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description:
Wool mark certified, Australian Marino Wool boot

Protect their little feet from the elements with this warm and cuddly Wallaby boot. Lined for toasty comfort, the mid-calf boot features a soft suede upper that's easy to pull on--even for the youngest crowd. Plus, its rubber sole and traction tread provide peace of mind on ice and snow. A rugged, stylish profile completes the Australian boot, making it great for indoor and outdoor wear.

Emu Australia is an authentic Australian footwear company that uses only premium Australian sheepskin and Merino wool, along with the best footwear technologies available, to product a quality line of boots and slippers. Due to the unique properties of Merino wool your feet will stay warm in the winter and cool in the summer.

See more
